  <datafield tag="246" ind1=" " ind2=" ">

  </datafield>
  <datafield tag="520" ind1=" " ind2=" ">
    <subfield code="a">This note describes the FLUKA and Actiwiz benchmark with gamma spectroscopy results of various material samples, which were irradiated during the Beam Dump Facility (BDF) prototype target test in the North Area of the Super Proton Synchrotron (SPS) at CERN.   <datafield tag="520" ind1=" " ind2=" ">
    <subfield code="a">This note describes the FLUKA and Actiwiz benchmark with gamma spectroscopy results of various material samples, which were irradiated during the Beam Dump Facility (BDF) prototype target test in the North Area of the Super Proton Synchrotron (SPS) at CERN. The samples represent most of the materials that will be used in the construction of the BDF facility.</subfield>
